name: Watch Dog® Porous Surface Graffiti Remover
description: Watch Dog® Porous Surface Graffiti Remover is an effective, professional strength, non-drip gel formula engineered to work from the inside out to emulsify the toughest, nastiest graffiti from unpainted porous masonry and wood surfaces. This product can be used on brick, marble, natural stone, cement, cinderblock, granite, sandstone, stucco, and pavers. Perfect for unpainted wood fences, picnic tables, and utility poles. Watch Dog® Porous Surface Graffiti Remover is a low VOC graffiti removal product that eliminates aerosol spray paints, markers, inks, and virtually all paints and coatings in a single application. This user-friendly product works in as little as 15 - 30 minutes!
